english: Change Standards for Registration Inspection Services for the Refrigeration and Air Conditioning Industries
title: 冷凍空調業規費收費標準

articles.content: These standards are enacted in accordance with Article 24 of the Refrigeration and Air Conditioning Industries Governance Act.

A refrigeration and air conditioning enterprise shall pay a review fee of NT$500 to request the central competent authority to process any of the following applications:
1. Application for a permit.
2. Application for issuance, alteration or replacement of a refrigeration and air conditioning enterprise registration certificate.

A refrigeration and air conditioning enterprise shall pay a certificate fee of NT$2,500 to the central competent authority for its application for issuance, alteration, replacement or reissuance of a refrigeration and air conditioning enterprise registration certificate.
These standards shall come into force from the date of promulgation.
